title: Apricot Bellini Recipe
full_text:
Apricot Bellini Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
apricot nectar
3/4
ounce
apricot brandy
3/4
ounce
Cognac
3
ounces
sparkling wine
Mint sprig
for garnish
Directions
Combine apricot nectar, cognac, and apricot brandy in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled champagne flute.
Add sparkling wine and stir gently. Garnish with a mint sprig and serve immediately.
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker, cocktail strainer
